info: The objective of the original project is supporting Cambodia’s economic development and strengthening subregional integration by enabling cost-effective and efficient railway transport within Cambodia, and between Cambodia and Thailand, Malaysia, and Singapore. The original project involves rehabilitating or reconstructing the railway and reestablishing the railway connection with Thailand. A private firm will operate the rehabilitated railway under a 30-year concession. The supplementary loan is to provide additional financing to the original project.
name: GMS:REHABILITATION OF THE RAILWAY IN CAMBODIA PROJ(SUPPLEMENTARY)
